Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Galatea in Rome (Repubblica), you'll be minutes from Palace of Expositions and Teatro dell'Opera di Roma. This hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 17 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palace of Expositions - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Quirinale Palace - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi

Church of Santa Maria dei Monti - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Torre delle Milizie - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Trajan's Market - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 23 km / 14.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Galatea is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hotel Galatea are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 23.1 km / 14.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Galatea is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
